narrative.narrative: Air Iceland is a subsidiary of Icelandair. They make thier home at Reykjavik Airport and have a focus city at Akureyri. In February 2014 they had five Fokker 50's and two Dash 8-200's. They have also had Dash 8-100's and ATR 42's. They serve 7 domestic airports and 5 in Denmark owned Greenland, and Vagar in the Faroe Islands also Denmark ruled. 2 of the domestic flights are operated by Nordlandair.
